password.invalid: Sorry, the provided password does not meet our required criteria!

phone.invalid: Sorry, the provided phone is not valid!

email_input.label: Email
email_input.invalid: Sorry, this is not a valid email address.
email_input.error: Either these credentials do not match our records or your account has not been activated yet.

1.title: Enter your email address to continue
1.subtitle: With a BidX account, you can seamlessly access BidX and all of our associated services with a single login.
1.invalid: Sorry, this email has been taken or is invalid!

2.title: Create a password to continue
2.subtitle: To continue, please enter your password. Ensure that your password is strong and secure.
2.password_min: Use a minimum of 6 characters (case sensitive) with at least one number or special character.

3.title: Additional information
3.subtitle: We’d love to learn more about you! Please provide a few additional details so we can personalize your experience.
3.newsletter: Yes! I would like to be informed about news and product updates about BidX and other services by email.
3.terms_1: By clicking "Agree & Continue", you create your BidX account governed by the
3.terms_2: and acknowledge that you have read our

4.title: Congratulations! You've successfully registered.
4.description: You’ll soon receive an email to activate your account. Follow the steps to start enjoying access to all our features, exclusive content, and a smooth, enjoyable experience with us!

exit_user_switch.title: Return to main account
exit_user_switch.content: Exiting current user means returning your app to the previously logged main user account.

setup_alert.title: Welcome to BidX!
setup_alert.description: To ensure you have full access to all our features, please visit our website and complete your account setup. Simply log in and follow the prompts to finish the process.

details.title: Detailed Log
details.description: Below, you will find a comprehensive overview for {date}, including all pertinent changes and modifications.

dialog.title: Sign Out
dialog.content: Singing out of this app means you'll also sign out of all other BidX apps on this device.

user_switch.description: Please go ahead and select the advertiser you would like to switch to:
user_switch.error: Before continuing you must select an advertiser!

settings.description: Manage your account details and keep your information up-to-date across the BidX Platform.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay connected to the latest trends and updates happening across the BidX Platform.
newsletter.toggle: I would like to be informed about news and product updates:

localization.title: Localization
localization.description: Customize your BidX Platform selecting desired preferred language, currency, and much more.

billing.description: We aim to make your payment process straightforward and transparent. Find below all the necessary information regarding your account and billing.

history.title: History
history.description: Below, you will find your last five invoices and corresponding payment receipts. You are welcome to export any of the generated invoices.

company_login.description: Please go ahead and select the company you would like to switch to:
company_login.error: Before continuing you must select a company!

menus.refresh_amazon_dialog: Refreshing amazon data means your data will be fetched and reloaded. This routine can take sometime.
